evidence.source_document: Joint Notice of Conditional Settlement and Stipulation to Stay Litigation Deadlines
evidence.text: The Parties stipulate to file a joint status report every 60 days during the stay to keep the Court apprised of the progress of finalizing the pending settlements.

evidence.source_document: Order Approving Settlements of Minors’ Claims
evidence.text: a. Plaintiff C.M. and minor Plaintiff B.M. each receiving $189,500, for a total Settlement Amount of $379,000;

extracted.value: Plaintiff C.M. and minor Plaintiff B.M. each receiving $189,500, for a total Settlement Amount of $379,000.

evidence.source_document: Order Approving Settlements of Minors’ Claims
evidence.text: b. Plaintiff L.G. and minor Plaintiff B.G. each receiving $108,000, for a total Settlement Amount of $216,000;

evidence.source_document: Order Approving Settlements of Minors’ Claims

evidence.source_document: Order Approving Settlements of Minors’ Claims

evidence.source_document: Order Approving Settlements of Minors’ Claims
evidence.text: The Court approves placement of B.M., B.G., L.A., and G.A.’s portions of the Settlements into pooled minors’ trusts operated by Legacy Enhancement until they reach the age of 18, 21, or 25.

extracted.value: The Court approves placement of B.M., B.G., L.A., and G.A.’s portions of the Settlements into pooled minors’ trusts operated by Legacy Enhancement until they reach the age of 18, 21, or 25.

evidence.source_document: Order Approving Settlements of Minors’ Claims
evidence.text: Plaintiffs’ counsel shall coordinate with C.M., L.G., O.A., and V.C. and Legacy Enhancement Trust for the execution of all necessary paperwork and funding of the pooled minors’ trusts on behalf of B.M., B.G., L.A., and G.A.

extracted.value: Plaintiffs’ counsel shall coordinate with C.M., L.G., O.A., and V.C. and Legacy Enhancement Trust for the execution of all necessary paperwork and funding of the pooled minors’ trusts on behalf of B.M., B.G., L.A., and G.A.

evidence.source_document: Order Approving Settlements of Minors’ Claims
evidence.text: IT IS HEREBY ORDERED: The Court approves the Settlements of the claims of minor Plaintiffs B.M., B.G., L.A., and G.A. in this Lawsuit.
